post.title: Bison Computers

card.content: My first job. Its been such a good experience. Thanks for giving me the opportunity to learn such a wide skillset.

post.intro:
Web Developer & IT Technician

My time at Bison Computers has been amazing. Coming into the workforce young I really appreciate all the help and support given to me. Peter, thank you for showing me everything you know and trusting me to help with your clients. I got to put into practice so much of what I have learned from building a PC and networking to websites and more.

content.caption: First Enjoying some LAN gaming with some clients, friends and family.
content.alt: Terence sitting behind his computer at a LAN, Local Area Network get together

content.content:
Some of my responsibilities have included:

  • Corresponding with clients (determining requirements according to their needs)

  • Designing and developing applications to suite the customer.

  • Updating existing applications.

  • Website Design / Development and implementation

  • Website Hosting and Email Setup

  • Website Marketing. (Website Optimizations, Search Engine Submissions, reciprocal links etc.)

  • Graphics Design

  • Maintenance of Video Editing Software and Hardware

  • Presentation Design / Development

  • Writing of support manuals.

  • Training of Clients on all systems

  • Server / Workstation setups

  • Hardware and Software Sales

  • Hardware Repairs

  • Wireless Networking

  • Networking

  • Point of Sale

  • Pastel Partner / Evolution Setup and Support

  • QuickBooks Setup and Support

Experience Gained

  • 7+ years Design and Development experience in:

    Languages:

    • VB 6.0 and VB .NET 2003

    • COM+

    • ASP

    • Java Script

    • VbScript

    • HTML

    • Dynamic HTML (CSS)

    Programs:

    • Visual Studio

    • Microsoft SQL Server

    • Microsoft Access

    • Macromedia Flash

    • Macromedia Fireworks

    • Adobe Photoshop

    • Microsoft Power Point

    • Pinnacle Studio

    • Pinnacle Liquid Edition

    • Adobe Premier

  • Object Orientated programming (OOP)

  • Application and Website Testing and Debugging

  • Error handling

  • Database Design and Development (SQL Server, Access)

  • Server side programming and implementation

  • Business integration

  • Financial Systems
